tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I went from one of the highest grades in my 180 to failing test after test in his class. I enjoy math and like a challenge but he was unbearable. He would move very quickly and if you tried to ask a question he would literally laugh at you. He definitely knows his material but I\'d suggest a teacher that doesn\'t yell at you for using a calculator.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: 1st of all: clearly a mathematical expert. No doubt. The issue comes with his attitude. He is borderline manipulative. He likes to smile and joke in class, but he is very unfair on grading. He says he is looking for work, and isn\'t concerned as much about the answer, but if you do the work perfectly and get the answer wrong, he takes off half cred

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This guy should not be a teacher. Worst Professor EVER! He doesn\'t help you learn like a real teacher should, he is rude and don\'t dare ask a question. He expects you to know everything before he teaches it. His quizzes and test are really hard and very unfairly graded. If you want to teach yourself calculus then take this class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: At first i thought i would really like this guy, but as the class dragged on and the homework got harder so did his lectures. He would move so fast some days that i didn\'t have time to raise my hand, and when somebody did ask a question he was very condescending in his answer. Only take him if are somebody who never needs help in class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Smart, tough, no-nonsense guy, doesn\'t like slackers, curt with silly questions, may not be for everyone. HW & quizzes are all on MyMathLab. Tests are moderately hard, but most questions taken from examples in class. If you want to actually learn math and are ready to work hard, take him. When he gets on a roll, he\'s actually pretty funny

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: One of the best math professors I had ever had, knows the material. If you decide to take him get ready to work for your, but at the end you will learn the material. He\'s a fair grader when you show him you study hard.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Best math teacher I have ever had.He will make you work your fingers to the bone,but you will learn the material precisely.He makes complicated math look simple.If he sees that you work hard,he will take that into account.Be prepared to do a lot of work and use a calculator as little as possible.But definitely the best.Tests/quizzes are very fair

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: He has an accent but it\'s mostly understandable. Does a pretty good job at explaining things, on the other hand he hates questions which made me regret taking his class... yes he can be extremely rude, and not helpful which makes an A in his class seem like a non-accomplishable feat. Some questions on tests/quizzes are also uncalled for(too hard).

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: He is a great professor. Im an international student so the way i learnt calculus was totally different. here I had difficulties at first but once he notices that you study hard and do your best, he is always gonna be a fair grader for you. He doesnt like easy questions because he is so smart :) If you wanna take him, be prepared to study hard.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Many students dropped. So rude, and he hates questions. Doesn\'t give back exams. Had to teach myself. Does give helpful worksheets, and he is a fast grader. Do not take unless you\'re good at math or can take abuse.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I personally thought he was a awesome teacher. Make me laugh, and it was an enjoyable class to be in. This was my second semester taking MA099, and I actually passed with a good grade. When i took this class with a different professor I failed. If I can go from a "F" in MA99 to a B+ you know this teacher is worth taking.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: One of the best professors I ever had. He really goes in details with each chapter however he gets irritated if you don\'t the basics of the chapter and does assign alot of homework. He also does go over the homework and reviews for the test. I recommend you to sit infront because it has more benefits esp at this class.He\'s very helpful.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I had him for 2 years in high school honors math prior to MC. He is not the nicest professor, but he was probably the best math teacher I\'ve ever had. Highly recommended, as long as you take him seriously.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (7)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: if a students math level is low he gets irritated and angry very easily. don\'t ask low level class quotations. despite all that he teaches clearly. he also gives lots of home works. basically if math is not your thing i don\'t recommend his classfor you.
